metadata.title: CVE-2020-8166 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: A CSRF forgery vulnerability exists in rails < 5.2.5, rails < 6.0.4 thatmakes it possible for an attacker to, given a global CSRF token such as theone present in the authenticity_token meta tag, forge a per-form CSRFtoken.

criterions.comment: rails package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
